import React, { useContext, useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react"; import { Link, useLocation, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { fectchCarByIdUser, setCartNone } from "../redux/slices/cartSlice"; import "../assets/styles/cart.css"; const CartComponent = (probs) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const cartStore = useSelector((state) => state.cart); const idUser = probs?.infoUser?.dataJwt?.id; useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { try { if (idUser) { dispatch(fectchCarByIdUser(idUser)); } } catch (err) { console.error(err); } }; fetchData(); }, []); return (
